8db8e023-9104-423b-abbd-f84ed5273a4c.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

95b2b2ea-d0a0-45d5-81e4-6f68146d1655.name: Tough Skin
95b2b2ea-d0a0-45d5-81e4-6f68146d1655.notes: Effects that just require skin contact or a scratch ignore this DR

60a66b9d-cc4f-4c19-8d52-22856df4b407.name: Partial (@Location, 1 level per -1 Per Hit Modifier, Torso is -10% thus level 1@)

83185f89-b289-48bb-8646-01f4ce68761b.name: Know Your Own Strength Variant Price

5cdd4233-ef57-4c9d-99a7-cd2d5d96337c.name: Wrestling Master
5cdd4233-ef57-4c9d-99a7-cd2d5d96337c.notes: Grapple & Parry count as being armed.

3eb14ba4-43bc-4652-9032-5264094f8fb6.notes: Recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

features.situation: to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, or resist poison

a19a98bd-6fd7-4392-890b-394d492c485c.name: Very Fit
a19a98bd-6fd7-4392-890b-394d492c485c.notes: Recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

features.situation: to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison

to HT rolls made for survival at -HP or below, and on any HT roll where failure means instant death. If this bonus makes the difference between success and failure, you collapse, apparently dead (or disabled), but come to in the usual amount of time. A successful Diagnosis roll reveals the truth.
to any HT roll to avoid unconsciousness

c706ac4e-689b-4845-b056-9fa1dec981a9.name: High Pain Threshold
c706ac4e-689b-4845-b056-9fa1dec981a9.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured

features.situation: on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning

fe2196b1-ed11-4466-9451-89c156a0e870.notes: Usable once per 30 minutes of play

to your effective HT whenever you roll to recover lost HP or to see if you can get over a crippling injury

77b8b5a2-e3bb-4872-8436-4e0df45a009f.name: Very Rapid Healing
77b8b5a2-e3bb-4872-8436-4e0df45a009f.notes: When you roll to recover lost HP, a successful HT roll means you heal 2 HP, not 1

features.situation: to effective HT when rolling to recover lost HP or to see if you can get over a crippling injury

976b9938-2c50-4e95-8102-22fba09edac7.name: Recovery
976b9938-2c50-4e95-8102-22fba09edac7.notes: When determining the length of time you remain unconscious for any reason, divide all times by 60

500a454d-abb5-43a5-8d34-2e395a59ddff.name: Unfazeable
500a454d-abb5-43a5-8d34-2e395a59ddff.notes: Exempt from fright checks. Reaction modifiers do not affect you.

af5bc8c4-5fc4-4ab7-8cf9-b83e9a6f82a7.name: -20 Points More From These or the Previous category

090e11e3-f434-497d-a762-f8291f5c99cb.name: Off-the-Shelf Looks
090e11e3-f434-497d-a762-f8291f5c99cb.notes: Halves the usual reaction bonus - adjust manually

4f6cc603-697d-4d57-a583-783d0ce532de.name: Bloodlust
4f6cc603-697d-4d57-a583-783d0ce532de.notes: You must make a self-control roll whenever you need to accept a surrender, evade a sentry, take a prisoner, etc.

features.situation: from past victims and anyone with Empathy
to Interrogation and Intimidation rolls when you use threats or torture
or worse from sober-minded citizens (GM discretion)

c255f77d-2630-4b56-ad23-2b214ab4509e.name: Gluttony
c255f77d-2630-4b56-ad23-2b214ab4509e.notes: Make a self-control roll when presented with a tempting morsel or good wine that, for some reason, you should resist. If you fail, you partake  regardless of the consequences.

0a149d53-06d2-4e22-82c3-b0d56f43bc3c.name: Overconfidence
0a149d53-06d2-4e22-82c3-b0d56f43bc3c.notes: You must make a self-control roll any time the GM feels you show an unreasonable degree of caution. If you fail, you must go ahead as though you were able to handle the situation!

features.situation: from young or naive individuals who believe you are as good as you say you are

e737c8d8-4f45-46d1-ab37-461c68d0946d.name: Greed
e737c8d8-4f45-46d1-ab37-461c68d0946d.notes: Make a self-control roll any time riches are offered  as payment for fair work, gains from adventure, spoils of crime, or just bait. If you fail, you do whatever it takes to get the payoff.

8178aea7-9745-4355-8971-d2d940854ca8.name: Obsession
8178aea7-9745-4355-8971-d2d940854ca8.notes: Wrestle and defeat some sort of monster; Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to deviate from your goal. If you fail, you continue to pursue your Obsession, regardless of the consequences.

48b1fc3e-d541-4e3b-8f28-ddf463baf37d.name: Vow
48b1fc3e-d541-4e3b-8f28-ddf463baf37d.notes: Never refuse a challenge to combat

84d8f844-0032-4a4a-a43b-485a8ef977d2.name: Judo
84d8f844-0032-4a4a-a43b-485a8ef977d2.notes: Allows parrying two different attacks per turn, one with each hand.

a3f6c3d1-b7f3-448e-bad9-d052ad33a033.name: One of these backup melee skills
